channel.title: CVE Feed for cscode -- EleForms – All In One Form Integration including DB for Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for cscode -- EleForms – All In One Form Integration including DB for Elementor

item.title: CVE-2024-2043|2024-05-02T16:52:13.126Z -- cscode -- EleForms – All In One Form Integration including DB for Elementor
item.description: The EleForms – All In One Form Integration including DB for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check when downloading form submissions in all versions up to, and including, 2.9.9.7. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view form submissions.

item.title: CVE-2024-2082|2024-05-02T16:52:41.080Z -- cscode -- EleForms – All In One Form Integration including DB for Elementor
item.description: The EleForms – All In One Form Integration including DB for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via several parameters in all versions up to, and including, 2.9.9.7 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
